title: [QUESTION]  Why SkiaSharp not working from nuget?
body:
Hello
My configuration:
1) Windows 10 Pro x64 (21H1)
2) Iphone SE (iOS 14.7.1)
3) VS 2019 CE 16.11.000.174

I try to make things working. I mean i want add SkiaSharp to my C# Xamarin.Forms project. But in debug mode appers an error:

